## Discussion

This property represents the reference boundary to use when defining [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSCollectionLayoutItem/contentInsets] on [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSCollectionLayoutBoundarySupplementaryItem] objects.

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentInsetsReference/automatic], which means any insets specified on a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSCollectionLayoutBoundarySupplementaryItem] follow the layout configuration’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCompositionalLayoutConfiguration/contentInsetsReference].

# supplementaryContentInsetsReference

**Instance Property**

The reference boundary for content insets on boundary supplementary items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var supplementaryContentInsetsReference: UIContentInsetsReference { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property represents the reference boundary to use when defining [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSCollectionLayoutItem/contentInsets] on [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSCollectionLayoutBoundarySupplementaryItem] objects.

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentInsetsReference/automatic], which means any insets specified on a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSCollectionLayoutBoundarySupplementaryItem] follow the layout configuration’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewCompositionalLayoutConfiguration/contentInsetsReference].

## Configuring section spacing

- **interGroupSpacing**: The amount of space between the groups in the section.
- **contentInsets**: The amount of space between the content of the section and its boundaries.
- **contentInsetsReference**: The boundary to reference when defining content insets.
- **UIContentInsetsReference**: Constants that describe the reference point of the content insets.
